name: Horrific Space
description:
Woken abruptly from your cryosleep, you find yourself in a seemingly abandoned space station. A warning tells you that the systems are offline. Try to get the station back online and discover what happened to the other crew. However, there has been a breach. You might find more than you bargained for.

  • Find and collect necessary items
  • Hide from whatever is lurking in the dark
  • Listen to your surroundings, your ears are a valuable tool

Horrific Space Team:

  • Robin Decock
  • Viktor Colpaert
  • Jeroen Janssens
